chat_translator_language_desc: 채팅 번역에 사용할 언어를 설정합니다(기본: 한국어).
chat_translator_hud_desc: 채팅창 표시용으로 사용 중인 HUD를 선택해 주십시오.
chat_translator_mouse_pointer_desc: Enables the Mouse pointer when opening the chat while ingame.
chat_translator_warning_hud_missing: The selected HUD is either not installed or it's chat option is disabled. If the latter is the case please select default.
chat_translator_warning_ultrawide_fix_mi: Ultrawide Fix to resolve scaling issues is not installed. Do you want to visit the mod page?
chat_translator_auto_translate_excludes_: 체크된 언어는 자동 번역되지 않고 원문 그대로 표시됩니다.
